verses.text: O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; for thou hast \w fallen|strong="H3782"\w* by thine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* with you \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Take \w away|strong="H5375"\w* all \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, and \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \add us\add* \w graciously|strong="H2896"\w*: so will we \w render|strong="H7999"\w* the \w calves|strong="H6499"\w* of our \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.\f + \fr 14.2 \ft receive…: or, give good\f*

\w Asshur|strong="H0804"\w* shall not \w save|strong="H3467"\w* us; we will not \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* upon \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*: neither will we \w say|strong="H0559"\w* any more to the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of our \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \add Ye are\add* our \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: for in thee the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w* findeth \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w*.

¶ I will \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* their \w backsliding|strong="H4878"\w*, I will \w love|strong="H0157"\w* them \w freely|strong="H5071"\w*: for mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* is turned \w away|strong="H7725"\w* from him.

I will be as the \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* unto \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: he shall \w grow|strong="H6524"\w* as the \w lily|strong="H7799"\w*, and cast \w forth|strong="H5221"\w* his \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* as \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.\f + \fr 14.5 \ft grow: or, blossom\f*\f + \fr 14.5 \ft cast…: Heb. strike\f*

His \w branches|strong="H3127"\w* shall \w spread|strong="H3212"\w*, and his \w beauty|strong="H1935"\w* shall be as the olive \w tree|strong="H2132"\w*, and his \w smell|strong="H7381"\w* as \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.\f + \fr 14.6 \ft spread: Heb. go\f*

They that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* under his \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w*; they shall \w revive|strong="H2421"\w* \add as\add* the \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, and \w grow|strong="H6524"\w* as the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*: the \w scent|strong="H2143"\w* thereof \add shall be\add* as the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.\f + \fr 14.7 \ft grow: or, blossom\f*\f + \fr 14.7 \ft scent: or, memorial\f*

\w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \add shall say\add*, What have I to do any more with \w idols|strong="H6091"\w*? I have \w heard|strong="H6030"\w* \add him\add*, and \w observed|strong="H7789"\w* him: I \add am\add* like a \w green|strong="H7488"\w* fir \w tree|strong="H1265"\w*. From me is thy \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*.

Who \add is\add* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, and he shall \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* these \add things\add*? \w prudent|strong="H0995"\w*, and he shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* them? for the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add are\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w*, and the \w just|strong="H6662"\w* shall \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in them: but the \w transgressors|strong="H6586"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* therein.
